original_title: А нечего за нашей Полиной приходить
overview: The life of the student Polina goes on as usual, until external circumstances unexpectedly interfere with her, or rather she is delayed at a rally. The next day, it's time to tell your parents about it. The heroine and her parents are separated not only by distance, but also by her views on life and politics.
title: You Don’t Wanna Come for Our Polina
